title: My Pc Shuts Down When I Open League
body: Whenever I open league on my MacBook Pro it immediately black screens the restarts I've already tried to factory reset m laptop and even ran a full repair of the client I am able to open the client but as soon as I try a custom game for about 2 minutes I shuts down. Pls help

replies.body: If your pc is shutting down then there could be a more serious hardware issue failing.  Double check your air vents if there are any to make sure there's no overheating.  Hit us up in [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well so our tech team can work with you directly and figure out what's going on.  See you there!
